page.description: Manage and communicate with node instances from Alpha Anywhere.

methodref.name: GetLastError
methodref.description: Load the last error generated by node.

methodref.name: InvokeEventHandler
methodref.description: Call a node handler directly from xbasic (no overhead) - used to test a node event handler from alpha5.

methodref.name: ListFolders
methodref.description: List the folders that are currently running.

methodref.name: Request
methodref.description: Make a JSON node request, returns a JSON packat response.

methodref.name: Settings
methodref.description: Get/Set node settings (in JSON format) - If settings don't exist, they are loaded from the a5node.json file in the folder.

methodref.name: Shutdown
methodref.description: Force a shutdown of the node service.

methodref.name: Startup
methodref.description: Startup node service without making any requests.
